content: After obtaining <style=Highlight>Omni-Vouchers</style> from the Omni-Gallery, you can use them at the <style=Highlight>Giftarium</style> to redeem from a selection of <style=Highlight>gifts</style> of undisclosed origins.
info: 初次参观万礼馆（废弃）_主流程文本II

content: I didn't catch that. Could you say that again?
info: 初次参观万礼馆（废弃）_主流程文本II

content: I still didn't catch that. Could you say that again?
info: 初次参观万礼馆（废弃）_主流程文本II

content: New redeemable gifts will be added to the Giftarium display stands from time to time, so keep an eye out! You can use the <style=Highlight>Unlock Display Stand</style> service by talking to <style=NpcName>Roofus</style>.
info: 初次参观万礼馆（废弃）_主流程文本II

content: The <style=Highlight>Unlock Display Stand</style> service also requires <style=Highlight>Omni-Vouchers</style> as proof of eligibility. If you don't have enough <style=Highlight>Omni-Vouchers</style>, the service may be unavailable. Would you like help with anything else?
info: 初次参观万礼馆（废弃）_主流程文本II

content: Wishing you a pleasant visit. I've automatically given myself a five-star review for the service I've provided. Thank you kindly.
info: 初次参观万礼馆（废弃）_主流程文本II
初次参观万礼馆（废弃）_主流程文本II

content:
Welcome to the <style=Highlight>Giftarium</style>.
To visit the Omni-Gallery, please exit and turn left—{短暂停}...BEEP. Information corrected.
info: 初次参观万礼馆（废弃）_主流程文本II

content: <style=Highlight>Omni-Vouchers</style> can be used to redeem <style=Highlight>redeemable gifts</style> from the <style=Highlight>display stands</style> or to <style=Highlight>unlock display stands</style>.
info: 初次参观万礼馆（废弃）_主流程文本II

content: Greetings, visitor! I'm <style=NpcName>Roofus</style>, the <style=Highlight>Giftarium's</style> trusty little robot. Welcome!
info: 初次参观万礼馆（废弃）_主流程文本II
初次参观万礼馆（废弃）_主流程文本II

content: If you need anything, feel free to ask at any time. Please note that "any time" does not include the periods immediately following or just before Roofus' shift ends.
info: 初次参观万礼馆（废弃）_主流程文本II

content: <style=Highlight>Omni-Vouchers</style> can be used to redeem <style=Highlight>redeemable gifts</style> from the <style=Highlight>display stands</style> or to <style=Highlight>unlock display stands</style>. Service completed. Thank you for supporting Roofus.
info: 初次参观万礼馆（废弃）_主流程文本II

content: I am glad the repeat function was helpful. I've just automatically given myself a five-star review on your behalf. Thank you kindly.
info: 初次参观万礼馆（废弃）_主流程文本II
